comments: Development of an Emergency Management Stakeholder Engagement Strategy. This contract was awarded using a PWGSC procurement tool. This contract contains two amendments. The original contract was awarded on February 23, 2015, for $43,957.00 and was reported on proactive disclosure. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
